title: Pokemon: Pikachu no Fuyuyasumi (Pokemon: Pikachu's Winter Vacation)
synopsis: Pikachu's Winter Vacations are three series of videos, each composed of several Pikachu shorts. All shorts deal with winter and Christmas. This is the first series and contains Christmas Night & Kanga Games.
voices: ['Ootani, Ikue', 'Koorogi, Satomi', 'Matsumoto, Rica', 'Ueda, Yuuji', 'Iizuka, Mayumi', 'Inuyama, Inuko']
staff: [['Yuyama, Kunihiko', ['Director']], ['Tajiri, Satoshi', ['Original Creator']], ['Sugimori, Ken', ['Original Character Design']], ['Iwane, Masaaki', ['Animation Director']]]
